Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Level Description: Developing: Emerging understanding, basic elements shown.
CAN: The student can draw two people, each holding an object that may resemble a cup or a device, indicating an attempt to depict a string telephone.
The student can include a line connecting the objects held by each person, suggesting a string, with occasional issues in clarity.
The student may show the string somewhat taut, but not consistently, reflecting an emerging understanding of the need for tension.
CANNOT: The student is likely unable to clearly depict sound traveling through the string, potentially omitting this element or representing it inaccurately.
The student often does not include labels or explanations about how the sound works in the string telephone (student doesnâ€™t know this or forgets to include it).
The student may not accurately represent the materials used for making the telephone, or may confuse them with other objects (e.g., mismatches in depicting cups as open-ended).
